title: A Christian turn'd Turke: or, The tragicall liues and deaths of the two famous pyrates, Ward and Dansiker As it hath beene publickly acted. VVritten by Robert Daborn, Gentleman.
author: Daborne, Robert, d. 1628.
publisher: Printed [by Nicholas Okes] by for [sic] William Barrenger, and are to be sold at the great north-doore of Pauls,
